description: Open LOA case for Alice Brown (define requirements)
subject: Create LOA case for Alice Brown
body: Please open an LOA case for Alice Brown. Capture DOB, NI number, Plan number, Current value, Platform name. Link to client record.

description: Advisor asks team to chase provider for Alice (teams)

chat_messages.author: Adviser
chat_messages.text: Please chase ABC Platform for Alice Brown's LOA (2 weeks now).

chat_messages.author: Admin
chat_messages.text: On it, will follow up now.

description: Provider missing info letter for Alice
document_text: We require Alice Brown's date of birth and NI number to proceed.

description: Client supplies DOB & NI for Alice (process reply)
subject: Re: LOA info for Alice Brown
body: DOB 03/04/1981, NI number XY123456Z for Alice Brown.

description: Provider supplies plan number & platform for Alice
subject: Re: LOA response — Alice Brown
body: Plan number 778899; Platform name ABC Platform. Valuation to follow.

description: Platform call confirms current value (Alice)

transcript_turns.speaker: Platform
transcript_turns.text: Current value is £52,430 as of yesterday.

description: Advisor confirms to close Alice case

chat_messages.author: Adviser
chat_messages.text: We have all info for Alice; please close the LOA case.

description: Marketing newsletter (ignore)
subject: Monthly newsletter
body: Thank you for subscribing. Click to unsubscribe.

description: Open Annual Review case for Ben Carter (schedule)
subject: Annual review — Ben Carter
body: Open Annual Review and schedule a meeting with Ben Carter for next week.

description: Create task to schedule Ben's meeting (AR)
subject: Schedule meeting with Ben Carter
body: Please schedule Ben's annual review meeting and send an invite.

description: Task completed: Ben's meeting scheduled (advance AR)

chat_messages.author: Admin
chat_messages.text: Meeting with Ben is scheduled for next Thursday 10am. Task done.

description: Create task: Prepare meeting pack for Ben (AR)
subject: Prepare meeting pack for Ben Carter
body: Please prepare agenda, latest statements, risk profile, recommendations.
expected_task_title: Prepare meeting pack for Ben Carter

description: Task completed: Ben's meeting pack prepared (advance AR)

chat_messages.author: Admin
chat_messages.text: Meeting pack for Ben prepared and uploaded. Task done.

expected_task_title: Prepare meeting pack for Ben Carter

description: Task completed: Hold meeting with Ben (advance AR)

chat_messages.author: Adviser
chat_messages.text: Held meeting with Ben today; please move to notes review.

description: Create task: Review Ben's meeting notes (AR)
subject: Review meeting notes for Ben Carter
body: Please review meeting notes and summarise actions.
expected_task_title: Review meeting notes for Ben Carter

description: Task completed: Review notes (advance AR)

chat_messages.author: Admin
chat_messages.text: Notes reviewed and summarised. Task completed.

expected_task_title: Review meeting notes for Ben Carter

description: Create task: Follow-up email to Ben (AR)
subject: Send follow-up email to Ben Carter
body: Please send a recap and next steps to Ben.
expected_task_title: Send follow-up email to Ben Carter

description: Task completed: Follow-up email sent (advance AR)

chat_messages.author: Admin
chat_messages.text: Follow-up email sent to Ben. Task done.

expected_task_title: Send follow-up email to Ben Carter

description: Create task: Draft annual review letter (AR)
subject: Draft annual review letter for Ben Carter
body: Please draft the annual review letter.
expected_task_title: Draft annual review letter for Ben Carter

description: Task completed: Annual review letter drafted (finalize AR)

chat_messages.author: Admin
chat_messages.text: Annual review letter drafted for Ben. Task done.
